segments.text: Emily , are you getting rushed by a sorority ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: More than one . I think the count is now three , if I remember correctly .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow . I'm getting rushed too , but just one . Are you thinking of joining any of them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know . I know there are advantages to joining , but I'm not much into group stuff .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The guys I've talked to say that the activities that go on in a frat house can be a little distracting depending on the group .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I'm going to decline . I just prefer to do my own thing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Were your parents involved in that kind of thing at all when they went to school ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My dad was , but not my mom .
segments.speaker: S2
